text:
I've been fighting w/ display issues in gmail and I can't seem to understand where the issue stems from. I'm using a media query to target mobile as such:

`@media screen and ( max-width: 650px ) {`

Works fine in most mobile email clients - but for some odd reason it isn't working for Gmail. The issues seem isolated to the header/footer areas of a template (`#headerTable`/`#footerTable` )- does HubSpot add some sort of Gmail specific CSS I am not able to hunt down?
Hi <@UKJSMBW6A> are your styles in head section?
yeah - its weird... i think it has something to do w/ the Gmail app auto resizing/scaling things but not sure.
If Gmail sees some CSS it doesn't recognise or like, it will strip out everything between those style tags.
